meanings.sent1: The velured sofa looked elegant in the living room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a velured dress to the fancy party.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to think the velured pillow was a luxurious bed.
meanings.sent4: The velured curtains added a touch of sophistication to the room.
meanings.sent5: The velured box felt soft to the touch.

meanings.definition: Having a velvety texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The velured petals of the flower felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The velured fabric of the blanket kept her warm on cold nights.
meanings.sent3: The chef's velured sauce made the dish extra rich and creamy.
meanings.sent4: The velured sky at sunset looked like a painting.
meanings.sent5: The velured kitten's fur was a delight to pet.
